## `SetPlotBackgroundColor` {#standard-setplotbackgroundcolor}

Sets the plot area color for all graphs.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetPlotBackgroundColor(string colorName)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `string` colorName | The name of the color to use. |
:::
